schemes.title: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
schemes.description: A credit-linked subsidy program for generating self-employment opportunities through micro-enterprise establishment.
schemes.eligibility: Any individual above 18 years of age. For projects costing above ₹10 lakh, the beneficiary should be at least 8th standard pass.

schemes.title: Stand-Up India Scheme
schemes.description: Facilitates bank loans between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 Crore to at least one Scheduled Caste (SC) or Scheduled Tribe (ST) borrower and at least one woman borrower per bank branch.
schemes.eligibility: SC/ST and/or women entrepreneurs, above 18 years of age.

schemes.title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
schemes.description: A government scheme that provides income support of up to ₹6,000 per year to all land-holding farmer families.
schemes.eligibility: All landholding farmer families with cultivable land.
